name: Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina
description:
Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is here! My virtual pet Emma the cat has reached a new stage in her life: ballet dance school for talking pets. This talking kitty cat will show off her new ballerina dance skills in Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game. Teach my talking cat Emma virtual pet bring style and grace into the world of talking pets. Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is a talking cat app that enriches all those dance games and ballerina games out there. Install Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina, a virtual cat pet app, ASAP and enjoy the company of your favorite ballerina talking cat.

 Can you multitask and make your talking cat ballerina glow from head to toe by making sure she is well fed, examined and rested? Emma the Ballerina, my talking cat, needs you every step of the way, so download Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game and help your talking cat pave the way to success! Virtual cat talking games will from now on take your breath away while my talking cat Emma parades her dance steps and ballet moves in her prima ballerina costume. All you need to do is make sure this gracious talking virtual cat attends all ballet classes in her ballet school and JUST DANCE!
 
✨TALKING CAT EMMA - MY BALLERINA FEATURES:✨
 
💃 LISTEN TO the ballerina virtual cat talking & repeating every word you say
🐱 CHECK-UP: take your injured ballerina talking cat to a hospital and heal her wounds, bruises or bone injuries she gets during her practices
💃PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT: the more your ballerina talking cat virtual pet practices, the more complex her choreography gets
🐱 BE CREATIVE: make your own choreography and watch Emma the cat virtual pet perform
💃 make your own BALLET MOVES PORTFOLIO that you can watch or SHARE
🐱 COLLECT all the prizes with Emma the talking cat and put them on the TROPHY WALL
💃 BALLERINA DRESS UP: style your talking kitty cat Emma into ballet costumes and accessories
🐱 Advance through the levels and change room decor so that your ballerina talking cat virtual pet feels like a real prima ballerina at her home
💃Win coins and diamonds, unlock levels and get fun awards in this ballerina virtual pet game
🐱 BALLERINA TALKING PET BEAUTY SALON: make your virtual pet turn into a beautiful ballerina talking cat; NOVELTY: play with her eyelashes as well
💃 NAME my ballerina talking cat as you like
🐱 Share your ballerina talking cat virtual pet with the world on popular social networks
 
✨LIVE EVERY LITTLE GIRL'S DREAM WITH TALKING CAT EMMA MY BALLERINA✨
 
Achieve what little girls dream of with Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual talking pet game. Help your talking virtual cat Emma attend as many ballet dance classes as possible and experience what it feels like to be a star talking pet on a stage of the Royal Theater. All those lights and special effects will make you feel butterflies in your stomach just like your little ballerina virtual cat pet in this ballerina dance game. Remember: becoming a Prima Ballerina is what my talking kitty cat Emma actually strives for, so all you need to do is get Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina and help her with that.
 
And now, a round of applause and a standing ovation for Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet, install and enjoy!
 
Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game has been developed by Peaksel.
